Articles.Content: I one of the updates gone past the LT-1 landing leg was changed from a simple folding leg to the telescopic one which we have today. I was wondering if anyone who still has a older version of the game would be able to put the landing leg up for download it would be much appreciated.
Doing so is OK by Squad, by the way.

It is going to be added to this mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99020-0-25-Kerbal-Historical-Institute-presents-Original-KSP-Parts?p=1519906&viewfull=1#post1519906

The landing leg is done, but he somehow forgot to include it:

Hi, yes the landing legs will be included in the next update.

I will release them when I'm back home at Friday or Saturday.

So just wait a few days.
